<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Scout](/Feats.aspx?ID=2133) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 206 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
master in Perception

</column>

---

When you scout, you are particularly alert for danger, granting your allies precious moments to prepare to fight. When using the [Scout](/Actions.aspx?ID=518) exploration activity, you grant your allies a +2 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls instead of a +1 circumstance bonus.
name: Incredible Scout
